q: Aaron Rodgers had what might be considered his national coming-out party off the field Monday night on CBS'`` Late Show with David Letterman '' and we saw all the same qualities. After the interview, David Letterman said, Let's just say, for the sake of this conversation, Aaron Rodgers had no athletic skills whatsoever.... Isn't he still the guy you'd want as quarterback? Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are`` very routine'' for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings. href="http://www.IndyStar.com/article/20110118/SPORTS03/110118012/Gene Huey-Gene Huey-surprised-being-fired-Colts-running-backs-coach&odyssey=mod|mostview"> Gene Huey `

X Factor involved the revelation that the pitch-correcting software Auto-Tune was used on at least one contestant's taped audition. Simon Cowell said on Monday it was the work of sound technicians and done without his knowledge. Once we found out what was going on it was stopped immediately.... The most important part was once the show went live and( viewers) could see that everyone was singing live and it was a proper, fair competition. .'' LooLeBron James for a spark, 76ers coach Eddie Jordan benched power forward Elton Brand and paired rookie Jrue Holiday in the backcourt with Allen Iverson . Eddie Jordan 's move worked: Jrue Holiday had 15 points, seven rebounds and six assists. He just put us in a good rhythm tonight and had us flowing, Allen Iverson said. Elton Brand , who was previously benched in some fourth quarters, said it was hard to complain about his role after a victory. We are continuing the search and will find more, Zahi Hawass told Reuters.
